data.title: Independent Private School in Nashville
data.meta_description: Battle Ground Academy is a co-educational, independent, college preparatory school for grades K-12 in Franklin, TN. Enroll with us today!
data.text:
In Lower School, we nurture each child’s intellectual, creative, moral, and physical growth on an individual level. It is a joyful place, inspiring not only lifelong learning but also character, scholarship, and service.

Through a dynamic curriculum that values learning through inquiry, students master foundational skills balanced with critical thinking and problem solving.

LEARN MORE about Lower School

The educational experience and learning environment of our Middle School balances academics with the interpersonal skills needed for developing boys and girls of high character.

With small classes and weekly advisory, we know each student well. We recognize their unique strengths and weaknesses, and the entire BGA team – teacher, coach, advisor, grade-level team leader, counselor, and dean – works together to ignite passions and nurture curiosity.

LEARN MORE about Middle School

As a college preparatory school, we put a strong focus on academics, but we know college preparedness goes beyond academic expectations. It’s about resilience, honor, character, service, and leadership.

Upper School students are guided to find a balance that allows them to complete their coursework at a high level while finding time to participate in extracurricular activities.

We walk alongside students as they navigate the challenges of being teenagers and prepare to live independently.

LEARN MORE about Upper School
